item.name: Date
item.title: Creation date
item.description: CreationDate notation options: yyyy | yyyy-mm | yyyy-mm-dd | Unknown | Unspecified

item.name: Latitude
item.title: Latitude
item.description: Latitude in decimal degrees

item.name: Longitude
item.title: Longitude
item.description: Longitude in decimal degrees

item.name: Elevation
item.title: Elevation
item.description: Elevation in metres above sea level

item.name: Key
item.title: Key
item.description: Enter the value of the key in this field. Key-Value fields are provided for backwards compatibility with IMDI metadata. Please only use them in case they are already present in existing metadata.

attribute.name: Name
attribute.title: Name
attribute.description: Enter the name of the key in this field.

item.name: Id
item.title: Id
item.description: Valid entries are: ISO639-3 language code (e.g. ISO639-3:nld) | Unknown | Unspecified

item.name: SL_Interpreting
item.title: SL_Interpreting
item.description: Properties of interpreting appearing in the session.

item.name: Source
item.title: Source
item.description: Source modality and language type.

item.name: Target
item.title: Target
item.description: Target modality and language type.

item.name: Visibility
item.title: Visibility
item.description: Visibility of the interpreter in the video recordings.

options.option: in view during part of session

item.name: Audience
item.title: Audience
item.description: Presence and nature of an audience that the interpreter is signing for.

options.option: heterogeneous group partly known to the interpreter

item.name: Key
item.title: Key
item.description: Enter the value of the key in this field. Key-Value fields are provided for backwards compatibility with IMDI metadata. Please only use them in case they are already present in existing metadata.

attribute.name: Name
attribute.title: Name
attribute.description: Enter the name of the key in this field.

item.name: BirthDate
item.title: BirthDate
item.description: BirthDate notation options: yyyy | yyyy-mm | yyyy-mm-dd | Unknown | Unspecified

item.name: Status
item.title: Status
item.description: Actor’s ability to hear.

item.name: AidType
item.title: AidType
item.description: Type of hearing aid the actor has.

item.name: ExposureAge
item.title: ExposureAge
item.description: Age at which exposure to sign language and sign language use started (years;months)

item.name: AcquisitionLocation
item.title: AcquisitionLocation
item.description: Place where sign language was learnt.

item.name: SignTeaching
item.title: SignTeaching
item.description: Amount of experience with teaching sign language.

item.name: Deafness
item.title: Deafness
item.description: Describes mother’s deafness status. Where appropriate, describe deafness status of alternative primary caregiver.

item.name: PrimaryCommunicationForm
item.title: PrimaryCommunicationForm
item.description: Describes mother’s language input towards the actor. Where appropriate, describe primary communication form of alternative primary caregiver.

item.name: Deafness
item.title: Deafness
item.description: Describes father’s deafness status. Where appropriate, describe deafness status of alternative primary caregiver.

item.name: PrimaryCommunicationForm
item.title: PrimaryCommunicationForm
item.description: Describes father’s language input towards the actor. Where appropriate, describe primary communication form of alternative primary caregiver.

item.name: Deafness
item.title: Deafness
item.description: Describes partner’s deafness status.

item.name: PrimaryCommunicationForm
item.title: PrimaryCommunicationForm
item.description: Describes partner’s language input towards the actor.

item.name: Age
item.title: Age
item.description: Describes the age during which the school was attended. Formatting: start age, dash, end age, for example: 3-6, 6;3-12;2, etc

item.name: SchoolType
item.title: SchoolType
item.description: Describes the type of school.

item.name: ClassKind
item.title: ClassKind
item.description: Describes the kind of class in the school.

item.name: EducationModel
item.title: EducationModel
item.description: Describes the education model used at the school. For combinations of oral education with cued speech, use ‘oral’, combinations with fingerspelling, use ‘mixed’.

item.name: Location
item.title: Location
item.description: Describes where (town or region) the institution was located.

item.name: BoardingSchool
item.title: BoardingSchool
item.description: Is the school a boarding school?

item.name: Key
item.title: Key
item.description: Enter the value of the key in this field. Key-Value fields are provided for backwards compatibility with IMDI metadata. Please only use them in case they are already present in existing metadata.

attribute.name: Name
attribute.title: Name
attribute.description: Enter the name of the key in this field.

item.name: Id
item.title: Id
item.description: Valid entries are: ISO639-3 language code (e.g. ISO639-3:nld) | Unknown | Unspecified
